title: North Korea state media hails historic summit
text:
North Korea state media hails historic summit 7:58am EDT - 02:01
North Korea's state news agency on Saturday called the inter-Korean summit a turning point for the Korean peninsula. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
North Korea's state news agency on Saturday called the inter-Korean summit a turning point for the Korean peninsula.
